item.content:encoded:
â£â£â£GIDA has just partners with AAX Exchange to run a 2 days FREE Crypto Trading Class.

â£â£See the tweet >> https://twitter.com/aax9ja/status/1514528041082490880…â£â£

ğ—”ğ—”ğ—« ğ˜„ğ—¶ğ—¹ğ—¹ ğ—¯ğ—² equally be ğ—¿ğ˜‚ğ—»ğ—»ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—® $ğŸ­ğŸ¬ ğ—®ğ—¶ğ—¿ğ—±ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—½ ğ˜ğ—¼ ğ—²ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜†ğ—¼ğ—»ğ—² ğ˜„ğ—µğ—¼ ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—´ğ—»ğ˜€ ğ˜‚ğ—½ ğ˜ğ—¼ ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ—²ğ˜…ğ—°ğ—µğ—®ğ—»ğ—´ğ—² ğ˜‚ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—šğ—œğ——ğ—”’ğ˜€ ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—¸, ğ—®ğ—»ğ—± ğ—½ğ—®ğ—¿ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—°ğ—¶ğ—½ğ—®ğ˜ğ—²ğ˜€ ğ—¶ğ—» ğ˜ğ—µğ—¶ğ˜€ ğ—°ğ—¹ğ—®ğ˜€ğ˜€.â£â£â£

Here is the special link to register with;â£â£â£

https://www.aax.com/invite/sign-up?inviteCode=M888nLi9QgLm2â£

Sign-up, verify and do your KYC, deposit $20 and fill the form. You’ll get a $10 bonus for trading futures and you can withdraw the profits.â£â£â£Fill this form after signing up to prepare for the class, and ensure you qualify to receive the $10 airdrop;â£â£

bit.ly/GIDAEasterBonusâ£

item.title: Technext Recognizes Ezemmuo Blockchain – Founder & CEO of GIDA
item.dc:creator: ginakev
item.description:
ğ—§ğ—²ğ—°ğ—µğ—¡ğ—²ğ˜…ğ˜, a leading media outfit interviewed Mr Okoye kevin Chibuoyim, the Founder and CEO of GIDA. Okoye Kevin founded GIDA that has gone on to train 1500+ students across the country | â€¢He organised the first-ever Blockchain conference in Southeast, Nigeria | â€¢Kevin and his team look forward to providing Africa and beyond, crypto education...

The post Technext Recognizes Ezemmuo Blockchain â€“ Founder & CEO of GIDA first appeared on Ginakev Digital Academy.
item.content:encoded:
ğ—§ğ—²ğ—°ğ—µğ—¡ğ—²ğ˜…ğ˜, a leading media outfit interviewed Mr Okoye kevin Chibuoyim, the Founder and CEO of GIDA.

Okoye Kevin founded GIDA that has gone on to train 1500+ students across the country | â€¢He organised the first-ever Blockchain conference in Southeast, Nigeria | â€¢Kevin and his team look forward to providing Africa and beyond, crypto education and insightful trading skills.

â€œAt first, I felt like giving up, as that was my life savings. But I decided not to give up easily. I was bitten more than once and broken, but said, â€œI must learn this thing.â€

~Ezemmuo Blockchain

Read the full interview here;

https://technext.ng/…/how-ezemmuo-blockchain-is…/

The post Technext Recognizes Ezemmuo Blockchain â€“ Founder & CEO of GIDA first appeared on Ginakev Digital Academy.

item.title: GIDA launches “Community Limelight” and Weekly Giveaway Program to appreciate the community.
item.dc:creator: ginakev
item.description:
GIDA launches it’s Community Limelight program to appreciate the community. The post GIDA launches â€œCommunity Limelightâ€ and Weekly Giveaway Program to appreciate the community. first appeared on Ginakev Digital Academy.
item.content:encoded:
GIDA launches it’s Community Limelight program to appreciate the community.

Every week, Ginakev Digital Academy(GIDA) would be recognising and rewarding it’s Outstanding Community members who actively participate in the community Telegram and social media with engagements.

ğ—•ğ—² ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ— ğ—¼ğ˜€ğ˜ ğ—”ğ—°ğ˜ğ—¶ğ˜ƒğ—² ğ— ğ—²ğ—ºğ—¯ğ—²ğ—¿ ğ—¶ğ—» ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ—§ğ—²ğ—¹ğ—²ğ—´ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—º ğ—šğ—¿ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ—½ ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ˜„ğ—²ğ—²ğ—¸, ğ—®ğ—»ğ—± ğ˜†ğ—¼ğ˜‚ ğ—´ğ—²ğ˜ ğ—¿ğ—²ğ—°ğ—¼ğ—´ğ—»ğ—¶ğ˜‡ğ—²ğ—± ğ—¼ğ—» ğ—®ğ—¹ğ—¹ ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ—¿ ğ˜€ğ—¼ğ—°ğ—¶ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ—ºğ—²ğ—±ğ—¶ğ—® ğ—®ğ˜€ ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ—–ğ—¼ğ—ºğ—ºğ˜‚ğ—»ğ—¶ğ˜ğ˜† ğ—Ÿğ—¶ğ—ºğ—²ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ—´ğ—µğ˜ ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ˜„ğ—²ğ—²ğ—¸. ğ—¬ğ—¼ğ˜‚ ğ—²ğ—¾ğ˜‚ğ—®ğ—¹ğ—¹ğ˜† ğ—´ğ—²ğ˜ ğ˜ğ—¼ ğ—ªğ—¶ğ—» ğ—¡ğŸ±,ğŸ¬ğŸ¬ğŸ¬!!

To Participate:

Join Our TG Group – t.me/OfficialGIDAChat

Join Our TG Channel –t.me/OfficialGIDA

Follow us on Twitter:https://twitter.com/Official_GIDA

Rules :

– Attend all Our Sessions and activities.

– Have highest number of interaction in the community Telegram Group for the week.

– Raise good conversations and give nice replies to posts.

– Spamming the group chat with fake and useless posts disqualifies you.

ğ—ªğ—¶ğ—»ğ—»ğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜€ ğ˜„ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ—¹ğ—± ğ—¯ğ—² ğ—½ğ—¶ğ—°ğ—¸ğ—²ğ—± ğ—²ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜† ğ—¦ğ—®ğ˜ğ˜‚ğ—¿ğ—±ğ—®ğ˜† ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ˜„ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—³ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—º ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ—§ğ—²ğ—¹ğ—²ğ—´ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—º ğ—šğ—¿ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ—½ ğ˜€ğ˜ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ˜€ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—°ğ˜€ ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ˜„ğ—²ğ—²ğ—¸, ğ—®ğ—»ğ—± ğ˜„ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—»ğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜€ ğ—®ğ—»ğ—»ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ—»ğ—°ğ—²ğ—± ğ—²ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜† ğ—¦ğ˜‚ğ—»ğ—±ğ—®ğ˜† ğ—¼ğ—» ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ—¿ ğ—¦ğ—¼ğ—°ğ—¶ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ— ğ—²ğ—±ğ—¶ğ—®.

The post GIDA launches â€œCommunity Limelightâ€ and Weekly Giveaway Program to appreciate the community. first appeared on Ginakev Digital Academy.
